original_title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse: Minnie's The Wizard of Dizz
overview: The classic tale gets a brand-new twist in Minnie's new full-length adventure: The Wizard Of Dizz. Minnie and Pluto end up in the silly but spectacular land of Dizz. Together, Minnie and her new friends Scarecrow Goofy, Mickey the Tin Mouse and Donald the Lion set off to ask the wonderful Wizard of Dizz to make their dreams come true.
title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse: Minnie's The Wizard of Dizz
